item.title: Engine roadmap
item.description: Engine roadmap There is a long road ahead: it’s going to require a lot of work and time to get to where we are going. We’ve been working on Mach for ~2 years now, primarily building out the Zig gamedev ecosystem, building foundational packages that we needed for Mach core, and as a result we’ve really just broken ground on the engine side of things. Development is fairly linear, but developments that you see aren’t linear, we were focused on more foundational things before - but yoday we’re actively focused on higher-level APIs which will have more profound impacts for end-users.
